comments:
3.0.2 RC1 200502161722

I found the exception below in my log after switching back from the lateset
I-build to 3.0.2. I had incoming changes in the Synchronize view and have opened
several of them in a compare editor. Then, I selected all projects with changes
and executed ContextMenu > Update, and suddenly, the error log contained this:

Error Feb 24, 2005 15:56:18.507 Problems occurred when invoking code from
plug-in: "org.eclipse.core.runtime".

This code has changed shape considerably in 3.1 so the bug is no longer valid.
